ENTRY.refkeywords: histogram grid bin count frequency graph 2d array
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Create a 2D histogram from a pair of axes and a pair of sample arrays

DESC.PARA: The histogram2d command creates a histogram array from an pair of samples and a pair of axes.

LIST.ITEM: x_grid - array of x bin edges
y_grid - array of y bin edges

SYNTAX.LINE: sherpa> n = histogram2d( val0, val1, x, y )

DESC.PARA: A binned 2D histogram is stored in the blank image created by the dataspace2d and set_dep commands.

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
